programme.title: Cube Zero
Kocka: Početak
programme.desc:
Cube Zero: Directed by Ernie Barbarash. With Zachary Bennett, David Huband, Stephanie Moore, Martin Roach. A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0377713/","name":"Cube Zero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA3ZmQ3YWQtM2ViNS00Mzk4LTk1ZWQtMWIyZTdkYzA5NjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0377713/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"morphion2"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not Awful, but Unnecessary","reviewBody":"Following the release of Cube 2: Hypercube (2003), and playing off the alleged success of the original Cube (1998), Director Ernie Barbarash takes the liberty of bringing us the third installment in the trilogy, the prequel Cube Zero.

Deep in the bowels of a giant and faceless institution, time and place unknown, two low-ranking operators, Wynn (Zachary Bennett) and Dodd (David Huband) sit and observe on monitors the behavior of people that have been placed in a giant network of cubic chambers, some of which are rigged with death traps. Told that the people they are observing are convicted felons who chose this horrific and deadly ordeal over a lethal injection, these observers have had no problem with their jobs until Wynn, a mathematical genius, discovers that one of the prisoners, a woman named Cassandra (Stephanie Moore) never agreed to be put inside the Cube. Suddenly it's realized that perhaps their "jobs" are not what they seem, and that they may be part of something deeply sick and twisted...

For people that have seen and enjoyed the original Cube, this prequel will probably not be to your liking. It's not that the story does not have potential; it's simply that the first Cube film never needed to be expanded on. Standing alone, it is a neat little psychological thriller with very interesting concepts and a certainty about its own message. It was also nicely self-contained. The problem with Cube Zero is that it destroys some of the mystique of the original, attempting to answer questions with more questions but only really resulting in making a mess of what never needed fixing.

What this new film has to offer, which is questions about the psychological nature of authoritarianism and the banality of evil, certainly are good questions to be raised, but probably should have been done so on their own merits, rather than as a continuation of a film that had no such aspirations.

Having said this, the other traits of the film, such as acting and direction and writing, are not awful. There is a bleak, dark look to the film akin to such film noir as 'The Matrix' and 'Dark City', and they have certainly managed to recapture the claustrophobic feeling of the first Cube. Unfortunately for Barbarash, these are not enough positive qualities to save it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":39410,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-11-10","keywords":"cyberpunk,part of trilogy,third part,underwater scene,countdown","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0072124/","name":"Zachary Bennett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601890/","name":"Stephanie Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0730045/","name":"Martin Roach"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053228/","name":"Ernie Barbarash"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109435/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053228/","name":"Ernie Barbarash"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Svaki član NCIS-a mora preuzeti odgovornost za posljedice svojih postupaka, počevši od Pridea. Loretta se uključuje u predizbornu kampanju. Kriminalistička serija pod nazivom Navy CSI New Orleans prikazuje tim specijalnih agenata koji istražuju slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje New Orleansa. Vođa tima agenata jest pravedni i hrabri Dwayne koji strastveno riješava svaki zadatak koji mu je dodijeljen.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što propadne tajna operacija u slučaju poslovnog čovjeka koji terorističkim činovima manipulira burzom vrijednosnica, ekipa Navy CIS-a traži nove tragove. Uz to, Bishop i Qasim (Rafi Silver) zajedno dolaze do prekretnice u slučaju.

programme.title: Navy CIS

Nakon što ugleda brata jednog od "Navy CIS-ovih najtraženijih zločinaca", Gibbs odmah preuzima svoj nekadašnji identitet i odlazi na tajni zadatak u njihovu ozloglašenu protuvladinu miliciju. Uz to, Bishop i Reeves surađuju u neslužbenoj istrazi.

programme.title: Totalcar
programme.desc: Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije! Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Kiefer Sutherland, Natascha McElhone, Paulo Costanzo, Adan Canto, Italia Ricci, LaMonica Garrett, Zoe McLellan, Ben Lawson

Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc:
SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, A.J. Buckley, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr.. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brentonh-31513"},"dateCreated":"2018-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Persona non grata","reviewBody":"A term used in the series that could apply to a lot of the previously uneducated reviews found for this title already.

Let's get one thing straight - this show is intended for the military-inclined audience and/or military enthusiasts. I was never a SEAL, but rather a Pararescueman for the USAF who served two tours overseas; many of the "cheesy" interactions and "campy" dialogue alleged by non-military serving reviewers are very realistic. This is how we talk. We crack poor, inappropriate jokes at the worst times because laughter - regardless of the timing - is our only weapon against the crippling anxiety that comes with combat deployments, regardless of who you are. Most of us shield ourselves from our own thoughts, especially when it's quiet, and even our loved ones (including those we served with) through humor. That is how we act and this series portrays that sense of fear amicably from the perspective of a real soldier. We speak quickly, we use jargon, we live and breathe what we do at that level because of the years of dedication to the cause that it takes just to get to that point.

Second, this inane need to downvote the series based on a "female operator" is not only ridiculous - but inaccurate. She is not an operator like the rest of the men, clearly acknowledged in Episode 2 when she tells Clay (the strap) to sit in the back with "her" and the "rest of the support team". She works in a TOC, a 'Tactical Operation Command'; the TOC is our lifeline when we're out in the field. Often times, your commanding officer, a procurement officer (supply), relief team and general support staff (including special JTF attachments like OSI, ATF, JAG, etc.) are on standby and are communicating with other assets in the general vicinity to coordinate the mission as it progresses.

Third, the technical adviser for this show is far more capable of portraying our armed forces in a respectable fashion than the vast majority of other shows on television. I saw a lot of complaints about Episode 1's "boat scene" shootout; clearly you've never fired a weapon on a moving skiff in the dark to understand that you're firing for effect - to suppress. Sure, you hope to land the shot, but a bouncing, lightweight skiff on top of firing at a moving object from another moving object makes even the best shooters in the world miss shots; that's just practical application to a common sense scenario. The show handles some complex issues, and my only complaint thus far has been the HALO/HAHO jump (would have to re-watch to see which it was) without the proper altitude gear - a minor flaw, certainly not enough reason to "stop watching" in disgust. I've also seen a few comments about how "predictable" and "archetyped" the characters are - well, no shit. That's precisely the reason they've made it to such top-tier outfits; no loose cannon or quirky halfwit makes it to teams like these because there's no spot for someone who's unpredictable. I feel like all of the "unrealistic" comments come from those who have nerved served and don't understand the military as a whole besides some bullshit "news" report they see on television masquerading as fact.

To close out, learn to enjoy quality shows for what they are and stop believing you're forced to pick extreme scores to show how outraged you are by a show; if this is honestly so poor that it deserves a '1' and is the worst television show you've ever seen - I'd love to see what television you feel deserves a 7+.Don't be so over-dramatic, and moreover, stop judging what you don't understand.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19553,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118568/","name":"A.J. Buckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

Buckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6473344, Title: SEAL Team, --- Description: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, A.J. Buckley, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr.. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"brentonh-31513","dateCreated":"2018-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Persona non grata","reviewBody":"A term used in the series that could apply to a lot of the previously uneducated reviews found for this title already.

Let's get one thing straight - this show is intended for the military-inclined audience and/or military enthusiasts. I was never a SEAL, but rather a Pararescueman for the USAF who served two tours overseas; many of the "cheesy" interactions and "campy" dialogue alleged by non-military serving reviewers are very realistic. This is how we talk. We crack poor, inappropriate jokes at the worst times because laughter - regardless of the timing - is our only weapon against the crippling anxiety that comes with combat deployments, regardless of who you are. Most of us shield ourselves from our own thoughts, especially when it's quiet, and even our loved ones (including those we served with) through humor. That is how we act and this series portrays that sense of fear amicably from the perspective of a real soldier. We speak quickly, we use jargon, we live and breathe what we do at that level because of the years of dedication to the cause that it takes just to get to that point.

Second, this inane need to downvote the series based on a "female operator" is not only ridiculous - but inaccurate. She is not an operator like the rest of the men, clearly acknowledged in Episode 2 when she tells Clay (the strap) to sit in the back with "her" and the "rest of the support team". She works in a TOC, a 'Tactical Operation Command'; the TOC is our lifeline when we're out in the field. Often times, your commanding officer, a procurement officer (supply), relief team and general support staff (including special JTF attachments like OSI, ATF, JAG, etc.) are on standby and are communicating with other assets in the general vicinity to coordinate the mission as it progresses.

Third, the technical adviser for this show is far more capable of portraying our armed forces in a respectable fashion than the vast majority of other shows on television. I saw a lot of complaints about Episode 1's "boat scene" shootout; clearly you've never fired a weapon on a moving skiff in the dark to understand that you're firing for effect - to suppress. Sure, you hope to land the shot, but a bouncing, lightweight skiff on top of firing at a moving object from another moving object makes even the best shooters in the world miss shots; that's just practical application to a common sense scenario. The show handles some complex issues, and my only complaint thus far has been the HALO/HAHO jump (would have to re-watch to see which it was) without the proper altitude gear - a minor flaw, certainly not enough reason to "stop watching" in disgust. I've also seen a few comments about how "predictable" and "archetyped" the characters are - well, no shit. That's precisely the reason they've made it to such top-tier outfits; no loose cannon or quirky halfwit makes it to teams like these because there's no spot for someone who's unpredictable. I feel like all of the "unrealistic" comments come from those who have nerved served and don't understand the military as a whole besides some bullshit "news" report they see on television masquerading as fact.

To close out, learn to enjoy quality shows for what they are and stop believing you're forced to pick extreme scores to show how outraged you are by a show; if this is honestly so poor that it deserves a '1' and is the worst television show you've ever seen - I'd love to see what television you feel deserves a 7+.Don't be so over-dramatic, and moreover, stop judging what you don't understand.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19553,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118568/","name":"A.J. Buckley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tuđinka
programme.desc: Serija priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Outlander je televizijska serija temeljena na istoimenoj povijesnoj seriji romana koju je napisala Diana Gabaldon, prateći priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Nakon završetka Drugog svjetskog rata Claire Randall konačno se ponovno sastaje sa suprugom Frankom.

credits.actor: Cam Gigandet, Jeremy Sisto, Audrey Marie Anderson, Judith Shekoni, Jocelyn Hudon, Ray Winstone, Ashley Thomas, Garry Chalk
Cam Gigandet, Jeremy Sisto, Audrey Marie Anderson, Judith Shekoni, Jocelyn Hudon, Ray Winstone, Ashley Thomas, Angela Gots
Svetlana Ivanova, Oleg Kamenshchikov, Viktoriya Maslova, Maksim Matveev, Lyubov Selyutina

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Kiefer Sutherland, Natascha McElhone, Paulo Costanzo, Adan Canto, Italia Ricci, LaMonica Garrett, Zoe McLellan, Ben Lawson

programme.desc:
SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, A.J. Buckley, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr.. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brentonh-31513"},"dateCreated":"2018-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Persona non grata","reviewBody":"A term used in the series that could apply to a lot of the previously uneducated reviews found for this title already.

Let's get one thing straight - this show is intended for the military-inclined audience and/or military enthusiasts. I was never a SEAL, but rather a Pararescueman for the USAF who served two tours overseas; many of the "cheesy" interactions and "campy" dialogue alleged by non-military serving reviewers are very realistic. This is how we talk. We crack poor, inappropriate jokes at the worst times because laughter - regardless of the timing - is our only weapon against the crippling anxiety that comes with combat deployments, regardless of who you are. Most of us shield ourselves from our own thoughts, especially when it's quiet, and even our loved ones (including those we served with) through humor. That is how we act and this series portrays that sense of fear amicably from the perspective of a real soldier. We speak quickly, we use jargon, we live and breathe what we do at that level because of the years of dedication to the cause that it takes just to get to that point.

Second, this inane need to downvote the series based on a "female operator" is not only ridiculous - but inaccurate. She is not an operator like the rest of the men, clearly acknowledged in Episode 2 when she tells Clay (the strap) to sit in the back with "her" and the "rest of the support team". She works in a TOC, a 'Tactical Operation Command'; the TOC is our lifeline when we're out in the field. Often times, your commanding officer, a procurement officer (supply), relief team and general support staff (including special JTF attachments like OSI, ATF, JAG, etc.) are on standby and are communicating with other assets in the general vicinity to coordinate the mission as it progresses.

Third, the technical adviser for this show is far more capable of portraying our armed forces in a respectable fashion than the vast majority of other shows on television. I saw a lot of complaints about Episode 1's "boat scene" shootout; clearly you've never fired a weapon on a moving skiff in the dark to understand that you're firing for effect - to suppress. Sure, you hope to land the shot, but a bouncing, lightweight skiff on top of firing at a moving object from another moving object makes even the best shooters in the world miss shots; that's just practical application to a common sense scenario. The show handles some complex issues, and my only complaint thus far has been the HALO/HAHO jump (would have to re-watch to see which it was) without the proper altitude gear - a minor flaw, certainly not enough reason to "stop watching" in disgust. I've also seen a few comments about how "predictable" and "archetyped" the characters are - well, no shit. That's precisely the reason they've made it to such top-tier outfits; no loose cannon or quirky halfwit makes it to teams like these because there's no spot for someone who's unpredictable. I feel like all of the "unrealistic" comments come from those who have nerved served and don't understand the military as a whole besides some bullshit "news" report they see on television masquerading as fact.

To close out, learn to enjoy quality shows for what they are and stop believing you're forced to pick extreme scores to show how outraged you are by a show; if this is honestly so poor that it deserves a '1' and is the worst television show you've ever seen - I'd love to see what television you feel deserves a 7+.Don't be so over-dramatic, and moreover, stop judging what you don't understand.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19553,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118568/","name":"A.J. Buckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Ganjajući pljačkaša, Nolan ga u samoobrani ubije. U međuvremenu, Bradfordova žena na tajnom je zadatku. Dok Bishop i Bradford pokušavaju prikupiti važne informacije protiv moćnog dilera droge, veza s... Ganjajući pljačkaša, Nolan ga u samoobrani ubije. U međuvremenu, Bradfordova žena na tajnom je zadatku. Dok Bishop i Bradford pokušavaju prikupiti važne informacije protiv moćnog dilera droge, veza s Bradfordovom ženom se prekida. U apartmanu je posvuda krv, a pronađena kamera je uništena. Očito je da su je oteli dileri. Chen vozi Nolana iz policijske postaje kući i oni završe u krevetu. I dok je Chen pod tušem, brat pljačkaša, kojeg je ubio Nolan, sada neočekivano napada.

programme.title: Celebs in Solitary
programme.desc: Poznata lica Stephen Manderson, Anthea Turner, Eddie Hall i Shazia Mirza podvrgavaju se samici. Poznata lica Stephen Manderson, Anthea Turner, Eddie Hall i Shazia Mirza podvrgavaju se samici. Pet dana u tišini nadzire psihijatar, a dr. Sandra Scott analizira i objašnjava psihološke učinke i koliko se svaki natjecatelj snalazi.

programme.desc:
The Oath: Created by Joe Halpin. With Ryan Kwanten, Katrina Law, Cory Hardrict, Joseph Julian Soria. Explores a world of gangs made up of those sworn to protect and shed light on corrupt and secret societies. And what if the Policemen use the criminals to arrest others." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7174764/","name":"The Oath","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1Mzk4NjI2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk5OTg4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Explores a world of gangs made up of those sworn to protect and shed light on corrupt and secret societies. And what if the Policemen use the criminals to arrest others.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7174764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Aktham_Tashtush"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as i expected "or better hoped for " but i think there's something there worth your time.","reviewBody":"So i just finished the whole season ,, a quick review , i'd say it is difinitly not as good as i expected ... but >>

The show with each and every episode keeps you somewhat interested and looking for more to know how things will end for this "police gang".

The plot is strong, but i think the script was a bit stretched and sometimes a little dull ,, i mean this could have been a really good 3/4 hours episodes show "Like what we see on BBC2" and it would've been fast strong and even more attracting.

talking Cast, they all were really good well engaging actors , you can't move on without bringing Sean Bean , as in the first 4-5 episode you'd think he has a minor role , appearing in prison a couple times, but hen after you'll see him more ,, you'll like him, then hate him then like him again :D but yeah over all the whole cast were good. 

but again maybe Crackle after they have changed to "Sony Crackle" wanted to pop up with the new Sony mask ,, who knows ,, but again , the show was okay, it grows with each hour , but as i said,, it needs a bit more work on the directing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1754,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-03-08","keywords":"arrest","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0492345/","name":"Katrina Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362484/","name":"Cory Hardrict"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0448478/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546172/","name":"Joe Halpin"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Oath: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3680550169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZiOWQ4N2UtY2M3MS00OTI0LWIxNzEtMDY4NDRiODllYzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZiOWQ4N2UtY2M3MS00OTI0LWIxNzEtMDY4NDRiODllYzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Oath: Season 1"}}</script><metacontent="

And what if the Policemen use the criminals to arrest others." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7174764/","name":"The Oath","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1Mzk4NjI2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk5OTg4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Explores a world of gangs made up of those sworn to protect and shed light on corrupt and secret societies. And what if the Policemen use the criminals to arrest others.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7174764/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Aktham_Tashtush","dateCreated":"2018-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as i expected "or better hoped for " but i think there's something there worth your time.","reviewBody":"So i just finished the whole season ,, a quick review , i'd say it is difinitly not as good as i expected ... but >>

The show with each and every episode keeps you somewhat interested and looking for more to know how things will end for this "police gang".

The plot is strong, but i think the script was a bit stretched and sometimes a little dull ,, i mean this could have been a really good 3/4 hours episodes show "Like what we see on BBC2" and it would've been fast strong and even more attracting.

talking Cast, they all were really good well engaging actors , you can't move on without bringing Sean Bean , as in the first 4-5 episode you'd think he has a minor role , appearing in prison a couple times, but hen after you'll see him more ,, you'll like him, then hate him then like him again :D but yeah over all the whole cast were good. 

but again maybe Crackle after they have changed to "Sony Crackle" wanted to pop up with the new Sony mask ,, who knows ,, but again , the show was okay, it grows with each hour , but as i said,, it needs a bit more work on the directing.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1754,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-03-08","keywords":"arrest","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0492345/","name":"Katrina Law","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362484/","name":"Cory Hardrict"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0448478/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546172/","name":"Joe Halpin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Oath: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3680550169","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZiOWQ4N2UtY2M3MS00OTI0LWIxNzEtMDY4NDRiODllYzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZiOWQ4N2UtY2M3MS00OTI0LWIxNzEtMDY4NDRiODllYzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Oath: Season 1"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Oath: Created by Joe Halpin. With Ryan Kwanten, Katrina Law, Cory Hardrict, Joseph Julian Soria. Explores a world of gangs made up of those sworn to protect and shed light on corrupt and secret societies. And what if the Policemen use the criminals to arrest others." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7174764/","name":"The Oath","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1Mzk4NjI2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk5OTg4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Explores a world of gangs made up of those sworn to protect and shed light on corrupt and secret societies. And what if the Policemen use the criminals to arrest others.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7174764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Aktham_Tashtush"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as i expected "or better hoped for " but i think there's something there worth your time.","reviewBody":"So i just finished the whole season ,, a quick review , i'd say it is difinitly not as good as i expected ... but >>

The show with each and every episode keeps you somewhat interested and looking for more to know how things will end for this "police gang".

The plot is strong, but i think the script was a bit stretched and sometimes a little dull ,, i mean this could have been a really good 3/4 hours episodes show "Like what we see on BBC2" and it would've been fast strong and even more attracting.

talking Cast, they all were really good well engaging actors , you can't move on without bringing Sean Bean , as in the first 4-5 episode you'd think he has a minor role , appearing in prison a couple times, but hen after you'll see him more ,, you'll like him, then hate him then like him again :D but yeah over all the whole cast were good. 

but again maybe Crackle after they have changed to "Sony Crackle" wanted to pop up with the new Sony mask ,, who knows ,, but again , the show was okay, it grows with each hour , but as i said,, it needs a bit more work on the directing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1754,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-03-08","keywords":"arrest","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0492345/","name":"Katrina Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362484/","name":"Cory Hardrict"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0448478/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546172/","name":"Joe Halpin"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Oath: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3680550169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZiOWQ4N2UtY2M3MS00OTI0LWIxNzEtMDY4NDRiODllYzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZiOWQ4N2UtY2M3MS00OTI0LWIxNzEtMDY4NDRiODllYzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Oath: Season 1"}}</script><metacontent="

The show with each and every episode keeps you somewhat interested and looking for more to know how things will end for this "police gang".

talking Cast, they all were really good well engaging actors , you can't move on without bringing Sean Bean , as in the first 4-5 episode you'd think he has a minor role , appearing in prison a couple times, but hen after you'll see him more ,, you'll like him, then hate him then like him again :D but yeah over all the whole cast were good.

programme.title: Noćna smjena
programme.desc: Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. U bolnici se doktori ne suočavaju samo s raznim bolestima i slučajevima, nego se i upoznavaju s novim romansama. Pratite uzbudljive trenutke ove serije i saznajte sve što se događa unutar tih bolničkih zidova!

Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan se uspije obraniti od napadača bacivši ga kroz prozor nakon čega zove pojačanje. U međuvremenu, Tim, Angela i Talia pronađu Isabel, koja je ranjena u glavu. Nolan i dalje laže Westu u vezi svog... Nolan se uspije obraniti od napadača bacivši ga kroz prozor nakon čega zove pojačanje. U međuvremenu, Tim, Angela i Talia pronađu Isabel, koja je ranjena u glavu. Nolan i dalje laže Westu u vezi svog intimnog odnosa s Lucy. Ujedno je primoran ostati u uredu dok se istraga o napadu na njega ne završi. Tim, Lucy, Jackson, Angela i Talia odlazi pronaći dilera droge Vancea, koji je pucao u Isabel te je ostavio da umre. Kada ga pronađu dođe do obračuna u kojem Lucy pomogne poroditi Vanceovu djevojku.

programme.title: Celebs in Solitary
programme.desc: Poznata lica Stephen Manderson, Anthea Turner, Eddie Hall i Shazia Mirza podvrgavaju se samici. Poznata lica Stephen Manderson, Anthea Turner, Eddie Hall i Shazia Mirza podvrgavaju se samici. Pet dana u tišini nadzire psihijatar, a dr. Sandra Scott analizira i objašnjava psihološke učinke i koliko se svaki natjecatelj snalazi.

The show with each and every episode keeps you somewhat interested and looking for more to know how things will end for this "police gang".

The plot is strong, but i think the script was a bit stretched and sometimes a little dull ,, i mean this could have been a really good 3/4 hours episodes show "Like what we see on BBC2" and it would've been fast strong and even more attracting.

talking Cast, they all were really good well engaging actors , you can't move on without bringing Sean Bean , as in the first 4-5 episode you'd think he has a minor role , appearing in prison a couple times, but hen after you'll see him more ,, you'll like him, then hate him then like him again :D but yeah over all the whole cast were good.

programme.title: Noćna smjena
programme.desc: Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. Američka serija The Night Shift prikazuje život doktora koji su vojnu bolnicu odlučili zamijeniti običnom u San Antoniu. U bolnici se doktori ne suočavaju samo s raznim bolestima i slučajevima, nego se i upoznavaju s novim romansama. Pratite uzbudljive trenutke ove serije i saznajte sve što se događa unutar tih bolničkih zidova!

programme.title: The Rebound
Ljubavni jackpot
programme.desc: The Rebound: Directed by Bart Freundlich. With Catherine Zeta-Jones, Justin Bartha, Andrew Cherry, Kelly Gould. In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1205535/","name":"The Rebound","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTk1NDkwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjkwNjI3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1205535/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"phd_travel"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fresh and enjoyable - charming leads","reviewBody":"Good May December romance movie. There are many funny laugh out loud moments in this movie. The jokes aren't clichéd and the dialog is original and fresh. Wish I could see more of Catherine Zeta Jones in movies these days. She is beautiful especially without too much makeup. Sometimes she looks too sophisticated to be in that situation but she is just a pleasure to watch on screen. It's also nice to see a woman not trying to be rail thin as she enters her forties. Justin Bartha is quite charming in this role. Although he isn't tall he can do romantic roles not just the sidekick stuff. Sometimes the dialog was a bit fast to catch. The story is feel good and not far fetched without being sentimental or predictable."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":47571,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-12-16","keywords":"older woman younger man relationship,male nanny,sex on couch,new york city,seeing a parent have sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Rebound: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4090955289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3NDA2MDMyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTEzNjU3Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3NDA2MDMyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTEzNjU3Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001876/","name":"Catherine Zeta-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058581/","name":"Justin Bartha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2006782/","name":"Andrew Cherry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294505/","name":"Bart Freundlich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0187451/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167581/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0252836/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294505/","name":"Bart Freundlich"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc:
Zero Dark Thirty: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. With Jason Clarke, Reda Kateb, Jessica Chastain, Kyle Chandler. A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1790885/","name":"Zero Dark Thirty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4OTUyNzcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQ1NDE3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1790885/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Danusha_Goska"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Technically Impressive but Surprisingly Hollow","reviewBody":""Zero Dark Thirty" is a grim, clinical depiction of the CIA search for Osama bin Laden. Its strongest feature is its dramatization of the Navy Seal Team 6 operation in Abbottabad, Pakistan, that killed bin Laden. That sequence is so professionally shot it could be actual documentary footage. 

"Zero" has no real plot. Episodic scenes occur in a choppy manner, one after the other. Scenes consist of depictions of beating and water boarding of detainees in order to gather information, agents stalking a suspect in Pakistan's crowded, chaotic bazaars, terrorist bombings, assassinations and assassination attempts. There are also scenes in offices where characters stare intently at computer screens or interrogation videos, and characters yell at each other and use obscenities, as their frustrating hunt for Osama bin Laden wears them down. 

"Zero" makes no attempt to draw the viewer in with any human sentiment. Characters are given no backstory and no character arch. CIA agent Maya, played by Jessica Chastain, is the closest the film has to a main character. She reveals no affect. Her face is blank. She isn't so much robotic as inert. We know nothing about her, except that she was recruited to the CIA while in high school – we are never told what would draw the CIA to a high school student. I didn't care about this character at all. All I kept thinking was, "Jessica Chastain is being praised for *this* performance? Why?" The dullness of her performance, and the underwritten character, made it almost impossible for me to lose myself in the story, such as it was. 

Jason Clarke is very strong and charismatic as Dan, a CIA interrogator. Dan humiliates, beats, and water boards suspects, and then feeds them delicious meals of hummus and olives when they deliver. His depiction of his work as just another job – he could be playing a bus driver with the same amount and degree of expressiveness – is provocative. I wish I had gone to see a film built around his character and his performance. 

Overall, I was disappointed in the film. Feature films are an art form. I want them to do to me what drama can do. I want to be made to identify with a character and I want, through that identification, to learn more about life, or I want to be entertained. "Zero" did neither for me. I wasn't entertained, and my understanding and worldview were not expanded. I think the same material could have been better treated in a documentary with selective re-enactments. 

"Zero Dark Thirty" sidesteps key questions. Maya sacrificed years of her life to the hunt for Osama bin Laden. Dan risks his humanity by making his living beating and humiliating other men. Men, women and children throughout the Muslim world, and, as the film makes clear, in America's and Europe's cities, are eager to blow themselves up, as long as they can take some infidels with them. Why? The film doesn't even acknowledge that there are people out there asking the question, never mind attempting to suggest an answer. 

The film opens with audio from the September 11, 2001 terror attacks, suggesting that the war between Islam and the non-Muslim world dates from that attack. Not so. Islam increased its territory through jihad from its invention in the seventh century until September 11, 1683, at the Battle of Vienna. After that defeat, Islam stopped its spread. The significance of the date of September 11 goes back over four centuries. 

America's founding fathers had to deal with jihad; see Thomas Jefferson and the Barbary Pirates. Some argue terrorism, including the 9-11 attack, is caused by Western imperialism. The solution to these thinkers is for the Western world to be nicer to non-Western nations, to practice multiculturalism and to share the wealth. Others argue that jihad is inextricable from Islam, and that one necessary step is for the West to recognize and cherish its own unique virtues – to cherish that for which its spies, soldiers, and citizens fight, sacrifice, kill and die. 

"Zero Dark Thirty" never so much as brushes up against these questions. At its key moment, the film is hollow. We all know how the hunt ends – we all know Osama bin Laden is dead. "Zero" might have addressed why Maya gave the time of her life to that hunt, why Dan risked his humanity, why Seal Team 6 trained for years and risked their lives. "Zero" never does consider why these, who might have been the film's heroes, did what they did, and I walked out of the theater oddly unmoved by all the high tension and graphic violence I'd just sat through.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":285993,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-01-23","keywords":"al qaeda,terrorist,special forces,death of osama bin laden,commando raid","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Best Picture Nominee","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2281482009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQyMjI4MTk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQ0MTY4OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQyMjI4MTk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQ0MTY4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the final theatrical trailer for Kathryn Bigelow's chronicle of the decade-long hunt for Osama bin Laden."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1567113/","name":"Jessica Chastain"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0249291/","name":"Joel Edgerton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000941/","name":"Kathryn Bigelow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676793/","name":"Mark Boal"}],"duration":"PT2H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The 6th Day: Directed by Roger Spottiswoode. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Rapaport, Tony Goldwyn, Michael Rooker. A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0216216/","name":"The 6th Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OTU5OTU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjMxMDk2._V1_.jpg","description":"A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0216216/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"npel"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Multiplicity meets Total Recall","reviewBody":"This movie felt like a combination of Michael Keaton's 1996 clone comedy, Multiplicity and Schwarzenegger's own Total Recall. Schwarzenegger is a helicopter pilot who after signing a big chartering contract with a wealthy tycoon, returns home on the night of his birthday and discovers that he's already home enjoying his birthday cake. Through the rest of the film, Arney is running from the bad guys who are trying to kill him for seeing his double and trying to learn why he has been cloned. I didn't mind this film and I actually found myself chuckling at Arnold's remarks after each kill. The dialog between the two Schwarzenegger's was kind of tacky but the special effects and action sequences make up for that. I wonder how much World Wrestling Federation owner Vince McMahon paid out to have his new XFL football league appear in the film?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":119226,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-02-07","keywords":"evil man,cloning,clone,future,laser gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The 6th Day","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1502478617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZlYjkwMzYtZmVjOS00YzcyLThkNTctYjFhYjA3ZDA1NzQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZlYjkwMzYtZmVjOS00YzcyLThkNTctYjFhYjA3ZDA1NzQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001650/","name":"Michael Rapaport"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001282/","name":"Tony Goldwyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006854/","name":"Roger Spottiswoode"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029574/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926727/","name":"Cormac Wibberley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926729/","name":"Marianne Wibberley"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

Ljubavni jackpot
programme.desc: The Rebound: Directed by Bart Freundlich. With Catherine Zeta-Jones, Justin Bartha, Andrew Cherry, Kelly Gould. In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1205535/","name":"The Rebound","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTk1NDkwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjkwNjI3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1205535/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"phd_travel"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fresh and enjoyable - charming leads","reviewBody":"Good May December romance movie. There are many funny laugh out loud moments in this movie. The jokes aren't clichéd and the dialog is original and fresh. Wish I could see more of Catherine Zeta Jones in movies these days. She is beautiful especially without too much makeup. Sometimes she looks too sophisticated to be in that situation but she is just a pleasure to watch on screen. It's also nice to see a woman not trying to be rail thin as she enters her forties. Justin Bartha is quite charming in this role. Although he isn't tall he can do romantic roles not just the sidekick stuff. Sometimes the dialog was a bit fast to catch. The story is feel good and not far fetched without being sentimental or predictable."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":47571,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-12-16","keywords":"older woman younger man relationship,male nanny,sex on couch,new york city,seeing a parent have sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Rebound: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4090955289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3NDA2MDMyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTEzNjU3Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3NDA2MDMyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTEzNjU3Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001876/","name":"Catherine Zeta-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058581/","name":"Justin Bartha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2006782/","name":"Andrew Cherry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294505/","name":"Bart Freundlich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0187451/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167581/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0252836/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294505/","name":"Bart Freundlich"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fack ju Göhte 3
Škola do bola
programme.desc: Fack ju Göhte 3: Directed by Bora Dagtekin. With Elyas M'Barek, Katja Riemann, Jella Haase, Sandra Hüller. A bank robber becomes a teacher after being released from prison and finds himself at the center of a number of crazy adventures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6471264/","name":"Fack ju Göhte 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlkYWJjZDItNzA2OS00ZWZjLTg4NmItNWRjMjJjNTZlODU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ3NzUxOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bank robber becomes a teacher after being released from prison and finds himself at the center of a number of crazy adventures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6471264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Breumaster"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too Much Over the Top","reviewBody":"The movie has some funny scenes, but also too much gross-out humour. It wouldn't be that, if it wasn't so over the top trying to be funny. On the other hand I do admire, that German movie makers at last try to come out having gut to go better ways. The main problem with Germans movie business is, that they always try to do a movie that has a deeper meaning - and then the movies become boring, except those movies about the second world war. I consider this as a new attempt to bring freshness into German cinema. Not the worst, not the best. I hope they keep the way and will be better in next productions. The movie itself tells, that this is the last part of this series. I hope the next projects will be less hectic and over-excited, but better - in a new way.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-10-26","keywords":"singing in a car,female teacher,teacher student relationship,teacher student conflict,munich germany","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153260825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065929/","name":"Elyas M'Barek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726257/","name":"Katja Riemann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3436464/","name":"Jella Haase"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
Povratak u Oz
programme.desc:
Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return: Directed by Will Finn, Daniel St. Pierre. With Dan Aykroyd, Jim Belushi, Kelsey Grammer, Lea Michele. Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0884726/","name":"Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0Nzg3ODc1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTYzNjQzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0884726/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bbickley13-921-58664"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Didn't like it.","reviewBody":"I really dislike this movie. It was one of the rare times when I went to see a movie and had low expectations for it and I left the movie with an even lower opinion of it.

In the movie, Dorthy comes back to Oz to rescue her old friends from a new villain with the help of some new friends, but the new friends are not as good as the Scarecrow, the Tin man, and the Lion. they had no depth to them and their purpose was weak.

This may have not been a big deal if Dorthy, the main character, wasn't so one-dimensional.

The new villain, the Jester had potential, but falls short. I think it had a lot to do with the character design overall, which tried to be creative but had no feel to it. Very strange, it was like the artist were not communicating with the animators 

I did not like the animation. I thought it was not smooth enough for a movie being released in theaters.

I guess the movie got the released because of all the names attached to the project. The movie was able to use the success of Glee's Lea Michelle who played Dorothy to get it out their. I recognized the voices of Dan Aykroyd and Martian Short, but the voice talent that made no sense was Patrick Stewart, who I feel had better things to do than this movie.

In a world with plenty of Wizard of Oz Sequel, Prequels, and spin-off this was by far the worse. You and your kids have better things to do.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5940,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2014-05-09","keywords":"oz,jester,owl,pigtails,wizard of oz","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1691724313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTM2MTI2NzczNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTEwMzAzMTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTM2MTI2NzczNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTEwMzAzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legends of Oz finds Dorothy waking to post-tornado Kansas, only to be whisked back to Oz to try to save her old friends the Scarecrow, the Lion, the Tin Man and Glinda from a devious new villain, the Jester. Wiser the owl, Marshal Mallow, China Princess and Tugg the tugboat join Dorothy on her latest magical journey through the colorful landscape of Oz to restore order and happiness to Emerald City."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584951/","name":"Lea Michele"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001288/","name":"Kelsey Grammer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0278181/","name":"Will Finn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0820800/","name":"Daniel St. Pierre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0307636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206196/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062126/","name":"Roger S. With Dan Aykroyd, Jim Belushi, Kelsey Grammer, Lea Michele. Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0884726/","name":"Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0Nzg3ODc1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTYzNjQzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0884726/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bbickley13-921-58664","dateCreated":"2014-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Didn't like it.","reviewBody":"I really dislike this movie. It was one of the rare times when I went to see a movie and had low expectations for it and I left the movie with an even lower opinion of it.

In the movie, Dorthy comes back to Oz to rescue her old friends from a new villain with the help of some new friends, but the new friends are not as good as the Scarecrow, the Tin man, and the Lion. they had no depth to them and their purpose was weak.

This may have not been a big deal if Dorthy, the main character, wasn't so one-dimensional.

The new villain, the Jester had potential, but falls short. I think it had a lot to do with the character design overall, which tried to be creative but had no feel to it. Very strange, it was like the artist were not communicating with the animators 

I did not like the animation. I thought it was not smooth enough for a movie being released in theaters.

I guess the movie got the released because of all the names attached to the project. The movie was able to use the success of Glee's Lea Michelle who played Dorothy to get it out their. I recognized the voices of Dan Aykroyd and Martian Short, but the voice talent that made no sense was Patrick Stewart, who I feel had better things to do than this movie.

In a world with plenty of Wizard of Oz Sequel, Prequels, and spin-off this was by far the worse. You and your kids have better things to do.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5940,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2014-05-09","keywords":"oz,jester,owl,pigtails,wizard of oz","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1691724313","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTM2MTI2NzczNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTEwMzAzMTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTM2MTI2NzczNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTEwMzAzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legends of Oz finds Dorothy waking to post-tornado Kansas, only to be whisked back to Oz to try to save her old friends the Scarecrow, the Lion, the Tin Man and Glinda from a devious new villain, the Jester. programme.title: Fury
Fury
programme.desc:
Fury: Directed by David Ayer. With Brad Pitt, Shia LaBeouf, Logan Lerman, Michael Peña. A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2713180/","name":"Fury","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MDU0NTUyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQxMzY4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2713180/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"film316-125-427677"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Inglouris Blastards","reviewBody":"People seem to think that war films are pretty hot right now, but they aren't. Having my ear so close to cinema I know for sure that there is always one or two war films floating around in the projection booths, but people are making somewhat of a big deal out of Fury, so I suppose the reel question is will this be a Flag For Our Fathers or will it make us wish for Apocalypse Now?

So lets get this out of the way now. Fury isn't as good as Saving Private Ryan, but then I don't think it ever meant to be, comparing the two movies is like saying that Saun Of The Dead isn't as good as The Book Of Eli, just because both films has similarities (in as much as they are set at the end of the world) doesn't mean they are anything alike. These are two films that are near logger heads with each other.

You see Fury is contained, and given an almost claustrophobic feel to it, the entire film is either inside or at close proximity of the tank that Collier commands. This gives the movie a focus, and a focal point. We are never given a rest from the tank and it's enforcing nature, we are given no repreave from it, just like the men themselves, we are trapped in a steel giant that is only purpose is to kill people.

To say that Fury is bloodthirsty would be an understatement, actually that's not fair for me to say. Fury doesn't enjoy itself in gore, it only tries to give us an accurate portrayal of what it must have been like for those brave men and women who faced death on a daily basis.

That's what David Ayer does really well, he controls his audience. In the opening scene we are shown Collier (Brad Pitt) ambushing and attacking a German officer, it is crude and desperate and over quickly but we can tell even then that is a man who cannot cope with the horrors he has had to endure.

Looking back there are so many moments in Fury that stand out as impressive. There is a single second where Collier shows his true emotions and it is incredible to view. Collier is a man who is forced to be a hero, he never chooses it, he wants only to survive this war.

Any war film can be impressive in it's action sequences, anyone can make loud noises and explosions and fighting, but if a war film can still shock and grip and captivate you in the slower periods, in the silences, that's when you know for sure you have an outstanding movie, and that is what happens with Fury.

Like all war movies, Fury ultimately builds to a climatic finale and truly I think it's one of the best I've ever seen, not because of the action or it's quality of visuals but because we have invested too much into the characters we have seen on screen.

The film of course would be nothing without the men inside the tank, those being Brad Pitt (who helms the best), Shia LaBouf, Logan Lerman, Michael Pena and Jon Bernthal. With these men there is no star, or main character, outside the tank the two leads are Logan Lerman (Who plays the new recruit) and Brad Pitt, however once we are inside the tank all men are equals, and dare I say it, but Shai LaBouf is actually quite good in his role. It's also always nice to see Jason Issacs on screen (hello to you).

Fury is a poignant and painful reminder of how much war can take from each of us, it is a film that never wants us to relax and we never do. Gory and gripping, Fury deserves a high spot in the history of war movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":452185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2014-10-22","keywords":"battle,tank,battlefield,world war two,combat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1850190873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxODA4ODIxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc2MDcxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxODA4ODIxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc2MDcxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and her five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered and out-gunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0479471/","name":"Shia LaBeouf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0503567/","name":"Logan Lerman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043742/","name":"David Ayer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043742/","name":"David Ayer"}],"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Life of David Gale
Život Davida Galea
programme.desc:
The Life of David Gale: Directed by Alan Parker. With Kate Winslet, Cleo King, Constance Jones, Kevin Spacey. A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0289992/","name":"The Life of David Gale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzU0NTgxNzZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU2MDQzNDkxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0289992/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"secondtake"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"It strains sometimes, but the plot and its twists will get you good. Great acting, too!","reviewBody":"The Life of David Gale (2003)

Whether you are pro or anti death penalty, there's not getting past the sensational, brave, and maybe insane elements of this story. Based on fact about a death row inmate who had been famous as a death row protester, the core of the movie is how a young reporter (a convincing Kate Winslet) interviews the inmate (an equally convincing Kevin Spacey) in the days before his scheduled execution. We are gradually shown the backstory through their interviews, and another story builds as the reporter chases down new leads, including missing video evidence. Laura Linney plays an important third lead that starts to throw doubts into everyone's mind, including the audience's.

All of this sounds like a great movie should have come out of it: superb casting and acting, a great story with believable but astounding twists, and a nice tight framework, day by day, with methodical flashbacks. Instead the movie both tries too hard and fumbles some of the key moments. What is clearly dramatic is sometimes made over-dramatic (Winslet running and running and running, or words like "innocent" spinning across the screen between scenes). Other sensationalist add-ons make the movie cheap (seeing a chaingang neatly working along the road just as they drive by). And simple reactions aren't believable (they way characters respond to someone following them, or to other threats). This is important stuff for a movie trying to recreate the truth. 

By my guess, the director is the key suspect, though he has a raft of successful films behind him, including the closest echo, Midnight Express (1978), which is about injustice and a prisoner who is extraordinary. But in all his films (that I've seen, which is quite a few, it turns out), there is a feeling of powerful story line carrying the day (Mississippi Burning, Birdy). Parker has also made a series of films tied to contemporary music, from Evita which is fair to The Commitments which is terrific fun, as well as The Wall, which might be his best film in all, though a difficult one. All of these films have a great setting, either musically or geographically.

Here we have only the dull backdrop of conservative Texas (if that's not redundant). And a blazing, heartwrenching story. Which is fair enough as a start. The Life of David Gale is a powerful morality tale, most of all, with some great acting, and many or most people watching will be glad they saw it. All those little flaws fade further and further as you get toward the end.

And then the end, the famous big final twist. That's memorable stuff. Wow.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116341,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-02-21","keywords":"wrongful conviction,murder,rape,charged with rape,waitress","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Life of David Gale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1617998873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZGM4NGEtY2IyMi00MWI4LWE5MGItZTZlMDhmOTg4NWNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZGM4NGEtY2IyMi00MWI4LWE5MGItZTZlMDhmOTg4NWNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001473/","name":"Laura Linney"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0502036/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1017488/","name":"Charles Randolph"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="
