programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
U 3:10 za Yumu
programme.desc:
3:10 to Yuma: Directed by James Mangold. With Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Logan Lerman, Dallas Roberts. A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381849/","name":"3:10 to Yuma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE0NTcxNTQzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzczOTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381849/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Modern Classic","reviewBody":"This is the best western since Unforgiven. Every aspect of this film is great. 

The acting was superb. Russell Crowe continues to give great and much overlooked performances. He delivers a great performance as outlaw Ben Wade. Crowe just keeps on putting me in shock with his spectacular performances. Crowe brought a mystique to his role that would of fit in with the old westerns. He seems as if he play anything and was a joy to watch here. He needs to be given much more and was definitely worthy of an Oscar nomination. Christain Bale also gives as a surprise to me a great performance as Dan Evans. He is on the verge of losing everything he's got. Bale displays his desperation and his willingness to feel that he has a purpose in life. He is definitely turning into a very good all around actor. I think he also deserved an Oscar nomination. Peter Fonda and Ben Foster also give very solid performances in their supporting roles. 

I have heard some people say that this western was to talky but I don't believe so. I think this was filled with great dialog and was engaging for the length of the movie.

The directing by James Mangold was probably the best I have seen from him. He was able to bring back the old western style but yet mix it together with a modern effects and etc. He did not fall into the trap of making it boring or to violent. He carried the movie all the way through keeping the viewer entertained. The cinematography was amazing. The sceneries were spectacular and many of the shooting scenes were delivered with such excellence with the acting, directing but the cinematography brought those scenes and this movie to another level. The music was great as well. It did not become cliché but instead made you feel like you were back watching Clint Eastwood, Gary Cooper or John Wayne. It just captured me like no other western has in a while. 

This movie is truly a modern classic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":298577,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-12","keywords":"outlaw,arizona territory,based on short story,outlaw gang,contention city arizona","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3:10 to Yuma","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2880504089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTYxNzUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzMjYy._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTYxNzUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzMjYy._V1_.jpg","description":"3:10 to Yuma - Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004936/","name":"Ben Foster"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919925/","name":"Halsted Welles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
Razum i osjećaji
programme.desc: Sense and Sensibility: Directed by Ang Lee. With James Fleet, Tom Wilkinson, Harriet Walter, Kate Winslet. Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114388/","name":"Sense and Sensibility","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk1MjU3MDQyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc1OTM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114388/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sharkey197"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"jaded seniors","reviewBody":"It's not easy to get seniors to do anything, even watch a movie and when you mention Jane Austen, they zone out. Yet each year when we do this film in class, about 80 percent end up loving it and that includes the guys. It's wonderful to watch them respond to the characters and get into a film that is so "talky" when they have been used to high action. To hear the girls call Willoughby a jerk and applaud Brandon at the end is great, but to listen to the boys comment on the behavior of the various characters is even better. How they respond to a society so filled with strict manners and codes of behavior also makes this film worthwhile and it generates much discussion about the importance of money in life; well, even Thompson in the commentary said the film is about money, who has it and who does not. I love showing this film to my students; after the groans when I start it on the first day, it's wonderful to hear their comments on day five when we finish. As one senior male said this year, "I wouldn't have rented this or wanted to see it, but now that I have, I admit it was pretty good, so I'm glad you showed it." This is why they are classics, kiddies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":109612,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1996-01-26","keywords":"england,19th century,based on novel,black hair,visit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [EN","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3393634073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQxZTE5YzUtMGZmMi00ZGNkLWE0NGMtN2EzZTI2YzVlMjQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQxZTE5YzUtMGZmMi00ZGNkLWE0NGMtN2EzZTI2YzVlMjQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281424/","name":"James Fleet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038270/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1046173/","name":"G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMTU1NzQwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1046173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"faija-1"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun movie - not even close to realistic, but fun.","reviewBody":"Let me first say that I knew absolutely nothing about the GI Joe franchise except that they were (are?) toys. But that did not hinder me from enjoying this movie.

What do you get if you mix a few parts James Bond, a few parts Transformers and a few parts Star Wars? Well, you get G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra! Basically, if you like the aforementioned movies you will probably enjoy this one. Things explode constantly, shiny things glimmer past the screen and hot chicks in tight outfits show up now and then.

If you are the type who crave realism in your movies then do not - I repeat, do not see this one. Realism does not even come within shooting distance of this movie. But if you can enjoy a popcorn summer movie then this is not a bad way to spend an afternoon.

And yes - there is a Wayans brother in this, but strangely enough, he did not annoy me...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":204833,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-09-23","keywords":"gi joe,swat team,2000s,destruction,iceberg","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"G.I. programme.title: Meet Joe Black
Upoznajte Joea Blacka
programme.desc: Meet Joe Black: Directed by Martin Brest. With Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Claire Forlani, Jake Weber. Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119643/","name":"Meet Joe Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0MzRmMTgtMTk4OS00MzdkLWJjNWMtZWJmZjlkYTI0YWRiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fredschepers"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"22 years later. And it still knocks you out.","reviewBody":"Film reviews are irrelevant. Perception is key. Meet Joe Black is a meet on its own. If you are not into romantic tear jerkers, watch this film and find out that your human and have the ability to change your mind. I speak from experience. The story: Simple and easy to understand. The director made a simple life event into a magical experience. Love and death go hand in hand in a mixture of sublime acting, awesome sceneries, superb dialogues, nerve touching details and result in a romantic drama where the sadness and emotions do not cover the happy ending and leaves you choked till the last over the rainbow tune ends. After 40 years of watching thousands of films, this film still is my number 1 film in my top 100 films where all one hundred share the first place. Brad Pitt, Sir Anthony Hopkins (brilliant classical composer btw) and the gorgeous Claire Forlany showed of their qualities. Same for all the other participants in thisepic story about how life will go on. Perception. ... but from my pov their best acting ever. I have seen it at least once every 2 years. If it will be your first time, settle for it. If you are still young, and think you become a film addict, be aware! You will get drawn in this film for decades to come. Enjoy this experience. And let it knock you out as well ☺","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":227605,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-11-13","keywords":"death,birthday,wealth,death personified,fear of death","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001231/","name":"Claire Forlani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000976/","name":"Martin Brest"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045196/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651592/","name":"Ron Osborn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719734/","name":"Jeff Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905458/","name":"Kevin Wade"}],"duration":"PT2H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: G.I. Jane
G.I. Jane
programme.desc:
G.I. Jane: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Demi Moore, Viggo Mortensen, Anne Bancroft, Jason Beghe. A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119173/","name":"G.I. Jane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJhOTY4M2EtNjA2Ny00YjBjLWE4MjItZjRiOTRhMGFjZmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jasp0002"},"dateCreated":"2004-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't believe the rating","reviewBody":"OK this is going to be a bit long... but it will be good food for discussions.

Yes, this movie is "Hollywood". The Plot line is predictable, but it is the concepts that the director explores along the way that make it interesting an thought-provoking, assuming you pay attention and didn't just rent it for the bang-bang, or a chance to see Demi in a wet T-shirt. Ridley make some mistakes, but he does some really good things too. Let me comment on what some other people have said, and talk about what I think Ridley does well with this film.

I think Mr. Scott gets a really excellent performance from Demi. I feel this is her best film, but I haven't seen to many, because she usually gets on my nerves. However, she is believable in the role of a woman who just wants to prove to herself that she can do this. I believe her when she says she doesn't want to be a poster child for women's rights... and the Commander is right in telling her that she's gonna have to wear that hat anyway.

Viggo is great too. I don't think too many people knew who he was when this movie came out, but he was even billed above Anne Bancroft. Someone said he looks embarrassed in every scene... hogwash. He looks like a very tough character in a very difficult situation. He knows that the issue is not whether a woman can make it, many can. This isn't about women's rights... this is about how men, mainly YOUNG men, relate to women in stressful situations. If all soldiers were in their late thirties, emotionally and psychologically, then the issue would be much smaller. Most of these guys are young, dumb and full of... you know the rhyme. I was there too, once upon a time. Viggo is excellent, he reacts the way many military instructors would... trying to stop the inevitable, fighting against politicians way over his head who have never been in the crap, but think they know better. Pay attention, you can just see that he respects LT O'Neil. But he believes he has to make an example out of her. Ms. Bancroft is excellent as well, some people say over the top, they obviously haven't had to deal with high level politics before. Perhaps she is a bit rough for reality, but remember, it is a movie, making a point, and being entertaining, things have to be gritty... and Senate will always be more vicious than any military training. I find her performance fun and a joy to watch.

I don't know if Mr. Scott has any military training, but he does a better job of conveying the realities of it to the screen than most. Yes, the SERE segment goes farther than real SERE training would go... but not by much. Talk to someone who's been through it. It would not have been the same group of instructors... it's a very specialized field and the instructors have extensive psychological screening and training. However, I'll give that one to Ridley, he's trying not to complicate the plot, and he needs the scene with Master Chief Urgayle. BTW Women do go through SERE sometimes... and the instructors do use them against the men's emotions.

As for other Militray stuff, much of the language, feelings about chain of command, frustration with training constraints and political a**-covering was /On The Spot/. I speak from 6 years of experience as an Army officer (some of the stuff you see on active duty is amazing, but in the end it all balances out and the US Armed Forces are still the best in the world). Even the way Ridley has to frig with the plot to put the trainees in a an actual firefight was plausible... not possible, but plausible. Remember, it is a movie, he's got to have a real combat situation to entertain the dumber audience who just came to see the boom. But Ridley even goes far enough to give the Master Chief a chance to back out. It is a group of Navy SEAL trainees, deep into their training cycle, with a buttload of prior experience (IF you pay attention you will note that one of the trainees is a US Army Ranger, one a Marine, probably from RECON, these are guys who know the job already, and this is true to reality). You are also talking about a straight forward mission facilitating extraction of US Army Rangers from the deep inland mission. Ridley even has that right, this would be a Ranger mission, and the Spec-ops community may do a joint op where the SEALS secure the sea-side extraction point.

Quite frankly... the movie is better than most people could have done. Matter of fact, I think it was a tough challenge for Mr. Scott and don't think anyone could have done much better. One bad point I agree with is that artistically, the movie is shot entirely too dark.. that's about the worst thing I can say about it though. As for plot predictability... how often do you REALLY see an original plotline?

One last comment. I was at the Army Officer's Advance Course when this movie came out. There was a group of Officer's that were gong to see this movie, ostensibly to have a good laugh. These were Ranger-qualified Infantry guys, a Marine officer from RECON, a couple guys going to or coming from SF training... all Type A's. The next day they weren't laughing... they just said "you know what, that wasn't half bad." That don't sound like much, but it's high praise from that group.

Probably why this has such a poor rating is because it isn't Hollywood enough for the lowest-common-denominator crowd.

Yes, this movie is "Hollywood". The Plot line is predictable, but it is the concepts that the director explores along the way that make it interesting an thought-provoking, assuming you pay attention and didn't just rent it for the bang-bang, or a chance to see Demi in a wet T-shirt. Ridley make some mistakes, but he does some really good things too. Let me comment on what some other people have said, and talk about what I think Ridley does well with this film.

I think Mr. Scott gets a really excellent performance from Demi. I feel this is her best film, but I haven't seen to many, because she usually gets on my nerves. However, she is believable in the role of a woman who just wants to prove to herself that she can do this. I believe her when she says she doesn't want to be a poster child for women's rights... and the Commander is right in telling her that she's gonna have to wear that hat anyway.

Perhaps she is a bit rough for reality, but remember, it is a movie, making a point, and being entertaining, things have to be gritty... and Senate will always be more vicious than any military training. It would not have been the same group of instructors... it's a very specialized field and the instructors have extensive psychological screening and training. However, I'll give that one to Ridley, he's trying not to complicate the plot, and he needs the scene with Master Chief Urgayle. BTW Women do go through SERE sometimes... and the instructors do use them against the men's emotions.

As for other Militray stuff, much of the language, feelings about chain of command, frustration with training constraints and political a**-covering was /On The Spot/. I speak from 6 years of experience as an Army officer (some of the stuff you see on active duty is amazing, but in the end it all balances out and the US Armed Forces are still the best in the world). Even the way Ridley has to frig with the plot to put the trainees in a an actual firefight was plausible... not possible, but plausible. Remember, it is a movie, he's got to have a real combat situation to entertain the dumber audience who just came to see the boom. But Ridley even goes far enough to give the Master Chief a chance to back out. It is a group of Navy SEAL trainees, deep into their training cycle, with a buttload of prior experience (IF you pay attention you will note that one of the trainees is a US Army Ranger, one a Marine, probably from RECON, these are guys who know the job already, and this is true to reality). You are also talking about a straight forward mission facilitating extraction of US Army Rangers from the deep inland mission. Ridley even has that right, this would be a Ranger mission, and the Spec-ops community may do a joint op where the SEALS secure the sea-side extraction point.

Quite frankly... the movie is better than most people could have done. Matter of fact, I think it was a tough challenge for Mr. Scott and don't think anyone could have done much better. One bad point I agree with is that artistically, the movie is shot entirely too dark.. that's about the worst thing I can say about it though. As for plot predictability... how often do you REALLY see an original plotline?

One last comment. I was at the Army Officer's Advance Course when this movie came out. There was a group of Officer's that were gong to see this movie, ostensibly to have a good laugh. These were Ranger-qualified Infantry guys, a Marine officer from RECON, a couple guys going to or coming from SF training... all Type A's. The next day they weren't laughing... they just said "you know what, that wasn't half bad." That don't sound like much, but it's high praise from that group.

Probably why this has such a poor rating is because it isn't Hollywood enough for the lowest-common-denominator crowd.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
Sakupljač kostiju
programme.desc:
The Bone Collector: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah, Michael Rooker. A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145681/","name":"The Bone Collector","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWQxN2ZmNDMtMzA2Ny00ZDJhLTlkNTgtMWMyZjljY2QzMzNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145681/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"denise_kate"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth a look! Both Jolie and Washington are on form","reviewBody":"I've read quite a few comments on this movie and some of them I disagree with and others I don't. Sure, it may be a little predictable and a bit 'all been done before' but there is a certain level of originality and uniqueness to it also.

For starters it has a fantastic cast and both lead actors (Jolie and Washington)have won Oscars and thats says something. It can't be easy playing a paralysed man and remaining so still and wooden and he plays the frustrations and emotions so realistically that I would imagine a person actually would be like in real life. Jolie is charming, composed and works well with the camera. Her character is convincing enough and this goes for her performance.The support cast is fantastic too, especially Queen Latifa.

The film may have the usual iconographic elements found in the psychological thriller genre but they are necessary for it to firstly conform and also progress. 'The Bone Collector' introduces new techniques and a slightly different angle for the viewer. there has to be a certain amount of repetition with this genre for it to work and this is the case for many others, such as romantic comedies and a couple falling in love or teen flicks with a football jock character.

I am currently writing my degree dissertation on sexual subjectivity in psychological thrillers and this film is perfect for that. The changing levels of gendered representations is very interesting and both supports and detracts away from the current representations in society.

I say, give it a go! Don't listen to people who have already seen it and didn't like it. If I'd have done that then I wouldn't have given it a go and my dissertation would have been short of argument!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161990,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-09","keywords":"criminal investigation,quadriplegic,new york city,copycat crime,paralysis","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bone Collector","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626617625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213281/","name":"Jeffery Deaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0406228/","name":"Jeremy Iacone"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lojërat Xhurasik
programme.desc: Dhjetë të burgosur, të dënuar me vdekje, detyrohen të marrin pjesë në një lojë virtuale që i vendos kundër dinozaurve dhe kundër njëri-tjetrit. Fituesi mund të jetë vetëm një, por kush vdes në lojë, vdes edhe në realitet.
programme.category: Aksion
horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: Lindja e dragoit
programme.desc: Philip Ng, Yu Xia. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të dyluftimit midis Bruce Lee dhe murgut shaolin Wong Jack Man, në vitet 1960. Një dyluftim që e ktheu Bruce Lee në një legjendë të arteve marciale.
programme.category: Arte marciale
aksion

programme.title: Dosjet Kein
programme.desc: Drew Fuller, William Atherton. Pasi arratiset nga burgu, një njeri kërkon hakmarrje kundër gangsterit që e do të vdekur me çdo kusht.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Drejtësi vdekjeprurëse
programme.desc: S.Seagal, M. Ory. Polici Kane dhe skuadra e tij, përballen me një gjeneratë të re kriminelësh, një shoqëri raciste e quajtur 'Shpresa e Re'. Ndërkohë prokurorja e përgjithshme përpiqet të vendosë pas hekurave një përdhunues serial.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Gangsteri, polici dhe Djalli
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Jetët e një vrasësi serial, një gangsteri dhe një polici në Korenë e Jugut, ndërthuren dhunshëm kur gangsteri i shpëton sulmit të hidhur të vrasësit dhe bashkëpunon me policin për tu hakmarrë.
programme.category: Kinemaja aziatike

programme.title: Shpërthim në Los Anxhelos
programme.desc: Një skenarist në krizë, një sizmiolog dhe një yll hollivudi duhet të bashkëpunojë për të qetësuar vullkanët që po shpërthejnë kudo nëpë Los Anxhelos, përpara se qyteti të shkatërrohet nga një shpërthim final.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Terror në hapësirë
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Stacioni hapësior ndërkombëtar është kthyer nëburg sekret. Kur një nga të burgosurit arrin të dalë nga qelia, plani i tij për të marrë kontorllinvështirësohet nga një agjent, që ka të tjera planepër stacionin dhe të burgosurit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në gjueti për të vrarë
programme.desc: Steve Austin, Eric Roberts. Një grup të arratisurish, marrin peng një agjent të kufirit dhe vajzën e tij adoleshente dhe fshihen në pyll. Por instinkti për mbijetesë do ta bëjë agjentin të fillojë gjuetinë e hakmarrjes...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Vrasja e fundit
programme.desc: 2020. Një specialist për mbrojtjen e personave, pranon një punë të fundit para se të tërhiqet nga profesioni i tij. Por, detyra e përmbyllëse do të kërkojë të gjithë përvojën e tij për të mbajtur të gjallë personat në ngarkim.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Panik total
programme.desc: Analisti i CIA-s Jack Ryan vihet ne ndjekje te nje grupi terrorristesh te cilet projektojne te shperthejne nje pajisje berthamore ne Superbowl.

programme.title: Plan arratie 2

programme.title: Njerëz të zakonshëm

programme.title: Misioni antiterror

programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Vjedhje ne Itali
programme.desc: Nje bande hajdutesh me ne krye Charlie Croker-in, realizon nje vjedhje spetakolare ne Itali. Por, dikush do t'jua marre trofene rruges dhe gjithcka zhvendoset ne Los Anxhelos...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Pakoja

programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Operacioni i shpëtimit

programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Mbretër të rrugës II
programme.desc: Ray Liotta, Clifton Powell. Në rrugët e dhunshme të Detroitit, dikush po vret një e nga një oficerët e policisë dhe dy hetues do të futen në një botë të rrezikshme korrupsioni për të zbuluar të vërtetën...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Dredd

programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Qyteti i policëve

programme.category: Aksion

thriller

thriller

programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
thriller

programme.title: Gjysma ime

programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Devdas

programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine, Christopher Plummer. Në 1943, një artiljer duke dhënë shpirt, i jep një vendasi një unazë për t'ia dorëzuar të dashurës në SHBA. Pesëdhjetë vjet më vonë, një burrë e gjen unazën dhe vendos të zbulojë historinë e saj...

programme.title: Qiell i kaltër
programme.desc: Projekti 'Qiell i kaltër' është misioni top sekret i majorit Henk Marshall. Por ka sekrete të cilat ai s'mund t'i mbajë dot fshehur. Fituese e Academy Awards, Jessica Lange. Fitues i Academy Awards, Tommy Lee Jones.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Xhoi

programme.category: Biografi
komedi
dramë

programme.title: Mëkatet e brezave
programme.desc: Dy vëllezër të ndarë prej kohësh i bashkon dëshira e fundit e nënës së tyre. Përmbushja e amanetit i çon ata në një udhëtim me kujtime të errëta, që vëllai i vogël nuk i mban mënd dhe që i madhi dëshiron të mund t'i harronte....
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vlerësimi
programme.desc: Anna Gunn, James Purefoy. Nje financiere që po bën gjithçka për të ngjitur shkallët e suksesit në botën e pafalshme të Wall Street, rrezikon gjithçka kur prezanton një kompani të re...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dashuria sipas Denit
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Juliette Binoche, Dane Cook. Një njeri i ve me tre vajza për të rritur, takon femrën perfekte. Por shumë shpejt ai zbulon se ajo është e dashura e të vëllait dhe këtu fillon dilema e madhe...
programme.category: Dramë romantike
komedi

programme.title: Prova
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit 2005. G.Paltrow, A.Hopkins. E përhumbur mes të kaluarës së t'et dhe hijeve të së ardhmes së saj: kjo është historia e Katerinës. Gjithë jeten i ka shërbyer të atit, gjeni në matematikë, dhe njeri me probleme mendore.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Matematika e dashurisë
programme.desc: Jessica Alba, Chris Messina. Mona, një vajzë e vetmuar i ka kushtuar gjithë fëmijërinë, pasionit më të madh: matematikës. Tashmë 20 vjeçe, ajo e gjen veten duke dhënë mësim matematike në fillore dhe ende duke u arratisur nga dashuria.
programme.category: Dramë familjare

programme.title: Zënka mes femrash
programme.desc: Sandra Oh, Anne Heche, Alicia Silverstone. Dy ish mikesha kolegji, jetët e të cilave nuk shkuan siç ato kishin shpresuar, takohen rastësisht pas dekadash. Ndërsa dy gratë afrohen përsëri, armiqësitë e varrosura prej kohësh dhe xhelozia e vjetër shpërthejn.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dashuria vjen papritur
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart, Jennifer Aniston. Një njeri i ve, që ka shkruar një libër mbi vetëshërimin shpirtëror, njihet me një vajzë në një nga seminaret e tij, e cila e bën të kuptojë se ende nuk është përballur me humbjen e së shoqes.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Vatha e qenve
programme.desc: Në një instutucion rehabilitimi për të rinjtë, tre adoleshentë përpiqen të qëndrojnë jashtë teleasheve ndërsa përballen me të burgosur të dhunshëm dhe të rritur abuzivë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vetmitari
programme.desc: Michael Douglas, Susan Sarandon. Danny De Vito. Kjo është historia e Ben Kalmen. Ai ka një familje perfekte dhe një karrierë të shkëlqyer. Por kjo nuk është një histori suksesi, por çfarë vjen pas tij...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Njerka
programme.desc: Julia Roberts, Susan Sarandon. Drama prekëse e dy grave, njëra nënë e dy fëmijëve dhe tjetra njerka e tyre. Një marrdhënie e trazuar, që ndryshon vetëm kur njëra prej tyre merr lajmin se është sëmurë rëndë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Parajsa pa shenjtorë
programme.desc: Casey Affleck, Rooney Mara. Një njeri merr përsipër fajin për krimin e kryer nga bashkëshortja dhe pasi arratiset nga burgu pas 4 vitesh vihet në kërkim të saj dhe të vajzës së tij të vogël, që nuk e ka takuar kurrë.
programme.category: Romancë
krim

programme.title: Greta
programme.desc: Një adoleshente e trazuar dhe rebele (Hilary Duff), dërgohet për të kaluar verën me gjyshërit e saj. Një verë e mbushur plot ngjarje që do t'i ndryshojnë përgjithmonë jetën.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Merr dhe lër
programme.desc: Jennifer Garner.Pas vdekjes së papritur të të fejuarit, një vajzë e re gjen prehje në shoqërinë e miqve të tij. Por pas zbulimit të disa të fshehtave rreth të fejuarit, ajo kupton se ai ishte një burrë shumë ndryshe nga ç'kishte menduar.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Frontera
programme.desc: Ed Harris, Michael Peña. Gruaja e një ish-sherifi vdes aksidentalisht në një fermë në kufirin mes Amerikës dhe Meksikës dhe faji bie një një emigrant ilegal. Por ndërkohë që hetimet vazhdojnë, jetët e shumë njerëve ndyrshojnë përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zemër e vrarë
programme.desc: Jessica Biel. Mei, një instruktore joge, e gjen veten të sillet në mënyra që kurrë nuk do të kishte imagjinuar për të mbrojtur motrën biologjike që sapo e ka takuar, nga i dashuri i saj i dhunshëm.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zonja e erëzave
programme.desc: Aishwarya Rai. Tilo është mjeshtre e erëzave dhe hap një dyqan në San Francisko. Ajo arrin të lexojë jetën dhe deshirat e klienteve të saj dhe u jep atyre erëza të ndryshme për t'i ndihmuar që të realizoje dëshirat e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vitet rebele
programme.desc: Liv Tyler, Joaquin Phoenix. Dy vëllezër të pashëm të klasës punëtore afrohen me vajzat e familjes më të pasur të qytetit. Ndërsa ndjenjat mes tyre forcohen, dallimet klasore dhe dramat familjare kërcënojnë dashuritë dhe jetët e të rinjve.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Tesla
programme.desc: 2020. Ethan Hawke. Shpikësi brilliant, vizionar, Nikola Tesla në luftën e tij të ashpër për të realizuar sistemin e tij revolucionar elektrik. Marrëdhënia me rivalin Tomas Edison, me përkrahësit e tij dhe takimi fatal me Anën.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Ditëlindja
programme.desc: Jeta e një punonjësi banke rreth të tridhjetave në qytetin e vogel te St Albans shkatërrohet nga mberritja e nuses se tij ruse, te cilen ai e kishte njohur ne internet.
programme.category: Nicole Kidman

programme.title: Alfa
programme.desc: Në të kaluarën parahistorike, një i ri përpiqet të kthehet në shtëpi pasi u nda nga fisi i tij gjatë një gjuetie. Ai gjen një ujk të plagosur e të braktisur dhe sëbashku fillojnë një miqësi që do të ndryshojë njerëzimin.

histori

programme.title: Papijon
programme.desc: Charlie Hunnam, Rami Malek. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. I dënuar gabimisht për vrajse, Henri Charriere lidh një aleancë të pazakontë me të dënuarin për falsifikim Luis Dega-n, në përpjekje për t'u arratisur nga burgu famëkeq në Ishullin e Djallit..
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Përpara se të iki
programme.desc: 12 shkurti, është thjesht një ditë tjetër për Samantën, derisa kuptohet se është dita e saj e fundit. E bllokuar për të ripërjetuar ditën e fundit, ajo duhet të zbulojë misterin e vdekjes dhe gjithçka që po humbet përpara se të iki.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Qëllimi i një qeni
programme.desc: Josh Gad, Dennis Quaid. Një qen përpiqet të kuptojë qëllimin e jetës së tij, përgjatë disa jetëve dhe me pronarë të ndryshëm.

dramë

programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Vegimet e mesnatës
programme.desc: Një njeri (Michael Shannon) përpiqet t'i shmanget qeverisë dhe një grupi fetar ekstremist, ndërkohë që kërkon të zbulojë të vërtetën e fuqive mbinatyrore të të birit (Jaeden Lieberher).

programme.title: Miq Armiq
programme.desc: Matthias Schoenaerts. Driss dhe Manuel u rritën si vëllezër, por ndoqën drejtime të kundërta në jetë: Manueli u bë kriminel, ndërsa Driss, polic. Kur dy burrat ritakohen, kuptojnë se kanë nevojë për njëri-tjetrin për të mbijetuar në botët e tyre.

thriller

programme.title: 47 metra nën det: Të pambrojtu
programme.desc: 2019. Katër vajza adoleshente që zhyten në një qytet të lashtë të përmbytur, mësojnë shpejt se kanë hyrë në territorin e specieve më vdekjeprurëse të peshkaqenëve, ndërsa notojnë në larbirintet klaustrofobike të shpellave nënujore.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Zonjat me të zeza
programme.desc: Julia Ormond. Në verën e vitit 1959, nën sfondin e ndryshimeve kulturore të Australisë, një vajzë e turpshme nis një punë verore në një dyqan prestigjoz. Atje ajo takohet me 'Zonjat me të zeza', të cilat do t'ia ndryshojnë jetën përgjithmonë.

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Si të bëhesh Latin Lover
programme.desc: Salma Hayek. Kur gruaja 80-vjeçare e lë për një djalë më të ri, një burrë që ka bërë karrierë duke joshur gratë e pasura, detyrohet të jetojë me të motrën. Ajo dhe nipi i saj 10-vjeçar do t'i mësojnë vlerat e vërteta të familjes.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Familja e marrë
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Anthony LaPaglia. Pasi gruaja e tij mbyllet në një spital psikiatrik, një politikan punëson një grua aspak të zakontë për t'u kujdesur për pesë vajzat e tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Befas në Paris
programme.desc: Simon Helberg, Melanie Lynskey. Bazuar në ngjarje të vërtetë. Quinn dhe e dashura e tij e parë janë bashkë prej vitesh dhe ai është gati t'i bëjë propozimin për martesë, deri kur një bjonde bukuroshe i rrëfen se është e dashuruar me të...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Shkolla e maskarenjve
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton, Jon Heder, Jacinda Barrett. Për ta ndihmuar që të bëjë për vete vajzën e ëndrrave, një i ri i pafat në çdo gjë që bën, regjistrohet në një kurs vetëbesimi. Problemi është se dhe profesori i tij pëlqen të njëjtën vajzë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Puthja e parë
programme.desc: Hakani ka probleme me krijmin e marrëdhenieve afatgjata me gratë. Gjërat ndryshojnë kur bie në dashuri me shikim të parë me Baharin. Por ka një pengesë. Ai duhet ta bëjë të dashurohet me të cdo ditë nga e para.
programme.category: Komedi Romantike

programme.title: Një i marrë në liri
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Ray Liotta, Sigourney Weaver. I sapo liruar nga burgu, Tomi zbulon se jeta jashtë hekurave është shumë më e vështirë. E motra s'e lë rehat, shoku i vjetër kërkon ta fusë sërish në lojë dhe ish e dashura e përndjek kudo...
programme.category: Komedi
krim

programme.title: E fejuara e babit
programme.desc: Massimo Boldi, Simona Ventura. Mes dy gjyshërve të ardhshëm do të çelë një romancë e papritur, që do t'i vërë të gjithë para dilemave të panumërta dhe do të krijojë një mal me telashe.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Më në fund erdhe ti
programme.desc: Asa Butterfield, Maisie Williams. Një adoleshent hipokondriak përballet me frikën e tij ndaj vdekjes kur një vajzë adoleshente e sëmurë terminale, i kërkon ta ndihmojë të plotësojë listën e saj të guximshme të dëshirave.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Korrespondentët specialë
programme.desc: Ricky Gervais, Eric Bana. Kur humbasin pasaportat e tyre, një ekip reporterësh radioje hiqen sikur raportojnë direkte nga një zonë lufte për t'i shpëtuar telasheve, por ky është vetëm fillimi i disa telasheve më të mëdha...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Rroftë Italia
programme.desc: Michele Placido, Raoul Bova, Ambra Angiolini, Alessandro Gassman. Politikani i njohur Michele Spagnolo pas një sëmundjeje të rëndë, fillon t'i tregojë 'të gjitha', duke ndryshuar kështu jetët e të gjithë të afërmve dhe atyre që e njohin...
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Stuhi tropikale
programme.desc: Satirë e filmave Hollivudianë me buxhet të madh dhe aktorëve të llastuar. Në xhungël për të xhiruar një film aksion, një grup aktorësh (Ben Stiller, Jack Black, Robert Downey Jr.), detyrohen të kthehen në ushtarë të vërtetë...
programme.category: Satirë

programme.title: Krishtlindje në Jug
programme.desc: 2017. Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo, Anna Tatangelo. Ambrogio dhe Peppino po festojnë Krishtlindjet sëbashku me familjet. Kur zbulojnë se djemtë e tyre kanë takim me dy vajza, vendosin ti ndihmojnë që takimi tu shkojë sa më mirë.
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Luftë baballarësh
programme.desc: 2015. Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg. Edhe pse është njerku i tyre Bred Uitakër, kërkon të jetë babai më i mirë për 2 fëmijët e gruas së tij. Por planet e tij kthehen përmbys kur papritur vjen për vizitë babai i tyre i vërtetë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Forca e muzikës
programme.desc: Kur një muzikant roku në moshë, humbet lidhjen me realitetin dhe fillon të prodhojë albume "unike", kompania e tij e menaxhimit dërgon një punonjës fillestar që t'i mbushë mendjen të firmosë një kontratë për ta hequr qafe...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: E paplotësuar
programme.desc: Eliza Dushku. Xhejn është një 20-vjeçare që vuan nga autizmi i lehtë. E dashuruar me filmat klasikë dhe e frymëzuar nga fejesa e motrës tepër protektive, ajo kërkon ndihmën e saj për të gjetur një të dashur.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ekstrakti
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Mila Kunis, Kristen Wiig. Pas një aksidenti të pazakontë në punë, pronari i një fabrike ekstraktesh bimore përballet me një mal problemesh si në jetën personale ashtu edhe në atë profesionale...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow
programme.desc: Rob Shneider. Nje shoqërues femrash me pagese, do t'i kërkoje Djus Bigellou që të kujdeset për shtëpine dhe peshkun e tij, por eksperienca do të rezultoje një katastrofe, dhe për Djus do të nisë karriera e dashnorit me pagese.
programme.category: Dashnori me pagesë

programme.title: Mr. Bean te berberi
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Mr. Bean, natën e mirë
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Shkolla e Shën Trinianit
programme.desc: R.Everett. Shën Triniani, shkolla e famshme për anarkinë dhe vajzat e saj të pakontrollueshme do të mbyllet. Por, vajzat s'janë dakort me këtë perspektivë të zymtë. Ato kanë një plan: të grabisin pikturën e famshme Vajza me vëth perle.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Një polic në Beverly Hills
programme.desc: E. Murphy ne rolin e nje polici nga Detroid me pushime ne Beverly Hills. Misioni Sekret: Te hetoje mbi vrasjen e mikut te tij me te mire. Do te shkaktoje konflikte te pazakonta me menyrat e tij teper origjinale te te venit ne vend te drejtesise.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Familja
programme.desc: Kate McKinnon. Karrieristja Kejti ngarkohet të kujdeset për mbesën e saj të çuditshme, Medin. Kur ajo largohet nga shtëpia, Kejti duhet të përballet me problemet e saj të socilaizimit në mënyrë që të ndihmojë mbesen e saj të kthehet në shtëpi.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ish e dashura ime
programme.desc: 2006. U.Thurman, L.Wilson. Matt Saunders-i, fort i ngathët me femrat, takon Jenny Johnson-in, bukuroshen që s'ka asgjë të përbashkët me vajzat që ai ka njohur deri tani. Ai ndjehet burri më me fat i botës, por kjo s'do të vazhdoje gjate.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Kolibri
programme.desc: Jason Statham. I pastrehë dhe në arrati nga një gjyq ushtarak, një ish ushtar i forcave speciale merr identietin e dikujt tjetër dhe kthehet në një vigjilant të ligjit në botën kriminale të Londrës.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: Sam Rockwell, Rosemarie DeWitt. Ne këtë riprodhim të historisë klasike të Steven Spielberg, një familje e përndjekur nga shpirtra djallëzorë duhet të shpëtojë vajzën e tyre të vogël, e cila rrezikon të zhduket përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Hakmarrja e burrit
programme.desc: 2017. Një fermer irlandez i moshës së mesme, tepër i sjellshëm dhe i përkushtuar ndaj nënës së tij, nis një hakmarrje të përgjakshme pasi ajo vritet gjatë një përpjekje për të grabitur shtëpinë e tyre.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Përndjekja e Tobi Xhagut
programme.desc: Robert Pattinson, Rachael Stirling. Gjatë Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një pilot i plagosur ndjen se çdo ditë që kalon në karrigen me rrota po e çon drejt çmendurisë.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Fluturimi i Feniksit
programme.desc: D.Quaid. Një avion mallrash në udhëtim rutinë përfshihet në vorbullen e një stuhie të paparë dhe bie në shkretëtirën e Gobit. Mes te mbijetuarve, një pasagjer i çuditshëm do të marrë situatën në dorë dhe do t'i vërë të gjithë në punë.
programme.category: Thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Fenomeni
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg, Zooey Deschanel, John Leguizamo. Pas disa ngjarjeve misterioze që rrezikojnë zhdukjen e njerëzimit, një njeri i zakonshëm ndërmerr një udhëtim të jashtëzakonshëm, në përpjekje për të shpëtuar familjen e tij.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Gënjeshtra
programme.desc: 2018. Peter Sarsgaard, Joey King. Kur vajza e tyre adoleshente rrëfen se ka kryer një krim të tmerrshëm, dy prindër të dëshpëruar përpiqen të mbulojnë krimin duke ngritur një rrjet gënjeshtrash dhe mashtrimi.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
Lego Batman film
programme.desc:
The Lego Batman Movie: Directed by Chris McKay. With Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes. A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4116284/","name":"The Lego Batman Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyNTEyOTY0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNzU3MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4116284/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Enjoyable Ride Thrusting Us Back Into The Lego Universe","reviewBody":"Growing up, Lego meant everything to me, my aspirations of becoming an architect, and even the result of me studying design engineering in university, were all due to my fascination with Lego as a child and the complex structures you could craft and create. In 2014, upon the announcement of 'The Lego Movie', despite my love for the toy, I was kinda doubting the general premise. How could you make a movie out of Lego? Well, that question was soon answered as I gawped in awe at the screen, the movie was fantastic. Now, the character from 'The Lego Movie'' that garnered the most love was Batman, a cocky, sarcastic, childish take on the superhero we know and love... well it was only going to be a matter of time before he got his own motion picture.

'The Lego Batman Movie' was definitely an enjoyable ride, and whilst I think it lacks in comparison to its predecessor, it stills thrusts us back into the universe that we came to revere in 2014. With an admirable cast of voice talent, and stunning animated visuals, 'The Lego Batman Movie' boasts undeniable creative talent, but does at times seem to be trying a little too hard to be funny, building off the reputation the initial film garnered.

Is this film worth viewing? Most definitely, it's a hilarious feel- good animated comedy, and definitely perfect for the younger audience. I actually saw this film prior to its full release during a preview a few days early, however I believe it may have been aimed more as a kids matinée... I was literally the only adult there, shameful I know, but heck, I didn't care. The kids in the audience continually laughed with glee, so its definitely something suited for that kind of audience, but don't skip over the older adults who are still children at heart, it's an alluring comedy that piles on the laughs, definitely worth a watch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138543,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2017-02-09","keywords":"lego,batmobile,dc comics,based on comic book,batman character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Extended TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi466269721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0NTAyMDA5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM2NzM4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"There are big changes brewing in Gotham, and if Batman wants to save the city from the Joker's hostile takeover, he may have to drop the lone vigilante thing, try to work with others, and maybe learn to lighten up."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0148418/","name":"Michael Cera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003021/","name":"Chris McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005154/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602537/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334381/","name":"Seth Grahame-Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571344/","name":"Chris McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273099/","name":"Erik Sommers"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Before Midnight
Prije ponoći
programme.desc:
Before Midnight: Directed by Richard Linklater. With Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, Jennifer Prior. We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2209418/","name":"Before Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NzgxODE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI1NTI0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2209418/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"flydocfly"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Third time's a Charm!","reviewBody":"I just saw this amazing movie at its Sundance premiere. It's wonderful on so many levels I don't know where to start. The performances are fantastic. If Julie Delpy doesn't get an Oscar nomination it would be a shame (the only stupider thing the Academy could do is have 10 best picture nominations.) Ethan Hawke's performance is brilliant in its own way, however, it's a less showy part and I'm not certain it'll get the recognition it deserves. 

The writing is astounding. Sharp, intelligent, biting, humorous, with staggering subtext, but most importantly--it feels real. If the screenplay doesn't get an Oscar nomination it would be a shame (the only thing stupider the Academy could do is have 15 best picture nominations.)

Rick Linklater is now officially the Jedi master of indie filmmaking (Yoda Soderbergh actually said he's giving up filmmaking.) SLACKERS was only 22 years ago, and Linklater has matured into one of the most original filmic storytellers in the history of the medium. 95% of the movie is two-shots of people talking (the other 5% is people talking at a dinner table and cut aways to the gorgeous Greek landscape.) I don't know any other living filmmaker who could pull this off. There's a one-take during a car drive that lasts probably ten minutes (before a brief cut away), however, it goes on for probably another ten minutes (and Linklater said he could have kept the whole take, but needed to show ruins along the country side and cut away for script purposes, not performance.) There's a 30 minute scene of the two actors in a hotel room and I didn't even notice it (by that time I was so invested in the characters and their actions and emotions I wasn't even aware of time, it wasn't until the post screening Q&A that Linklater mentioned the actual time of the scene.) 

All three, Linklater, Delpy, and Hawke have matured into their rolls (writing, directing, acting) so easily that it's all just great fun for them and the audience. This is a must see for many reasons (including the history of film--there's only one other modern trilogy where the final film is the best--LOTR, and their food budget was probably more than the total cost of BEFORE MIDNIGHT.)

i could go on gushing about this movie ad nauseum, however I'll finish by saying that BEFORE MIDNIGHT is what indie film making (and the Sundance Film Festival) is all about--truly original, creative, unique, interesting characters and their stories, told outside the Hollywood system, by people passionate about their craft (and in this case at the top of their craft).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":149215,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-06-13","keywords":"marriage,hotel,hotel room,writer,dinner","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4026246681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NTEzMjcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2NzIzOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NTEzMjcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2NzIzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet Celine and Jesse 9 years on. Almost 2 decades have passed since that first meeting on a train bound for Vienna, and we now find them in their early 40's in Greece. Before the clock strikes midnight, we will again become part of their story. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2089090/","name":"Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0273107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0402483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2089090/","name":"Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0273107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0402483/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: De-Lovely
De-lovely
programme.desc:
De-Lovely: Directed by Irwin Winkler. With Kevin Kline, Ashley Judd, Jonathan Pryce, Kevin McNally. Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0352277/","name":"De-Lovely","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyODgwODIyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTkzMTczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0352277/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"seaview1"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"De-Lovely is indeed lovely","reviewBody":"As a biography, De-Lovely is not historically accurate, but as drama and a tribute to Cole Porter, a prodigious talent in musical theater, it is sublime. Kevin Kline is perfectly cast in spirit as the songwriter extraordinaire who stormed Broadway as Hollywood beckoned. His marriage to Linda Porter (a terrific Ashley Judd) is a relationship of lasting love fraught with infidelity and heartbreak in which Porter is portrayed as an insatiable artist whose homoerotic dalliances were legend. The timeline spans the 1920's through the 1950's. This is not so much a simple biopic but, rather, an interesting depiction of Porter's constant struggle to find happiness in love and life and it proves to be an addictive intoxication. As his accepting and understanding wife grows increasingly frustrated with his lies and deception amid his growing list of male suitors, Porter's life and health begin to unravel. 

Serving as a framework for the life events is a curious narration of sorts by an aged Porter and a mysterious host/angel (a nice theatrical turn by Jonathan Pryce). This bracketing narration is reminiscent of A Christmas Carol, and there are striking similarities to the classic All That Jazz in narrative and tone. The main story is told in a series of mini-vignettes; some scenes are almost too brief. Then there are the songs. It is truly phenomenal just how many wonderful Porter songs became standards. The recreations of many of his top hits are interspersed throughout the film and are performed often by top vocalists including some amusing cameos by Elvis Costello, Diana Krall, Alanis Morissette, and Natalie Cole. The songs serve to parallel and punctuate the life events throughout the story in much the same way paintings served as a co-narrative in Frieda.

Although production values are good for a period and location piece, it feels a little less grand in scope than it ought to be. Perhaps that works in the films favor as a more intimate story. Standout credit goes to the makeup effects especially showing the aging of Kevin Kline's character. The camera work and editing are imaginative especially in a series of circular tracking shots which seamlessly meld one timeframe with another. The music is timeless and enjoyable even when sung in pedestrian fashion by Kline. And regarding Kline, he deserves an Oscar nomination for a richly etched portrait of a tortured soul whose search for true love spanned his entire life. Perhaps in the hands of Bob Fosse or Baz Luhrmann, this could have really launched into a wildly imaginative send-off of a musical genius, but director Irwin Winkler (a respected producer turned director like Alan Pakula) has done Cole Porter proud."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11195,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2004-08-06","keywords":"jukebox musical,horseback riding,cole porter character,monty woolley character,louis b. mayer character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4233871641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RmYmVjNjctM2Y4Ni00NmM1LTg2ZGYtOTg3OTQ2MzQ2Njc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RmYmVjNjctM2Y4Ni00NmM1LTg2ZGYtOTg3OTQ2MzQ2Njc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000177/","name":"Kevin Kline"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000171/","name":"Ashley Judd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000596/","name":"Jonathan Pryce"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005563/","name":"Irwin Winkler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098170/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0168379/","name":"Jay Cocks"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Home: Directed by Tim Johnson. With Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin, Jennifer Lopez. An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2224026/","name":"Home","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExOTQ4MDMyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3NDM2MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2224026/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sky_magician"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"pretty good","reviewBody":"The only con I have to really say about this movie is,


* All the Rihanna songs. It felt like every song on the soundtrack was one of hers. If you're a huge fan and never get tired of her, take it as a treat. Otherwise it is excessive. It'd be fine with a couple songs, and maybe one more playing on their TV or radio, but as the only music at all?



* The morals were very impressive. But somehow, in some very strange way, they felt miss-able, even though they were right there, highlighted. It may have been partly due to the movie feeling slightly detached. I'm not sure how else to put it. And... all the excessive distracting Rihanna. In important scenes I felt myself paying more attention to the fact that it was another one of her songs playing, again. Shes definitely not a bad artist, and I don't dislike her. Even if it was one of my favorite bands instead, I'd probably feel the same, hoping they play something else.


The movie had a lot of highly creative elements, which I always appreciate in an animated film. Dreamsworks does a fine job with its characterization as always, even with Tip coming out with a character trait we all saw coming (every single movie has one.) The antagonists and lessons were great, how the characters treaded the planet's 'renovation' was fun to watch. The relationships and character growth was exceptionally well done.

I'd give it a 6.5, but no decimals. It was there, yet it also wasn't? I'd still watch it again. Just takes a little push for this movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":97448,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-03-25","keywords":"alien,human,friendship,interspecies friendship,outer space","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Feel The Light (From The Original Motion Picture Soundtrack, Home)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2222961433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTExMjQzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc1NDM5NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTExMjQzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc1NDM5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Music video by Jennifer Lopez performing Feel The Light (From The Original Motion Picture Soundtrack, Home). programme.title: Ulovi i ubij
programme.desc: Tajni špijun Igor Ostrovsky govori o tome kako je angažiran za praćenje i prikupljanje obavještajnih podataka o Farrowu i neočekivanom preokretu koji ga je ponukao da postane Farrowov izvor. Tajni špijun Igor Ostrovsky govori o tome kako je angažiran za praćenje i prikupljanje obavještajnih podataka o Farrowu i neočekivanom preokretu koji ga je ponukao da postane Farrowov izvor. John Scott-Railton iz "Citizen Laba" također govori o porastu privatne špijunaže i njezinim posljedicama, kao i naporima u borbi protiv nje.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
Zora živih mrtvaca
programme.desc:
Dawn of the Dead: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Sarah Polley, Ving Rhames, Jake Weber, Mekhi Phifer. A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0363547/","name":"Dawn of the Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M2ZmU2OGQtNmU5Yi00MTIyLTgwNWMtYjljMzZlYTdiNjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0363547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"filmbuff-36"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":""Attention Shoppers! The mall is now closing forever.."","reviewBody":"How will mankind behave in the end times? Will we turn into raving lunatics and attack one another? Will we try to slavishly hold onto some fabric of our society? Will we kick back and accept what is happening?

`Dawn of the Dead' in some ways tries to answer that question. The movie, a remake of George Romero's classic 1978 sequel to `Night of the Living Dead,' throws a group of people together while society crumbles around them and allows the viewer to watch as humans seek to survive an onslaught of the undead.

The movie opens with the unimaginable happening. Hordes of zombies have overtaken Milwaukee and numerous survivors are both fighting off the monsters and trying to escape the city. One such group includes Ana (Sarah Polley), a nurse who is running scared after losing her husband, Kenneth (Ving Rhames), a tough-as-nails cop, Michael (Jake Weber), who tries to be two-steps ahead of any dangerous situation, and Andre (Mekhi Phifer), whose trying to care of his pregnant wife.

Seeking shelter from the waves of zombie attacks, the group decides to head toward a local mall and hole up there until help arrives. Once inside they join with security guards and use the shopping center as a refuge from the undead while trying to piece together what's left of their lives.

The plot is pretty straightforward, and relies mostly on cliché themes to move the story along. So as a rule, most films such as this tend to be predictable and quite tepid. Luckily, `Dawn of the Dead' has strong personalities to fall back on, making it thankfully every bit a character-driven drama as it is a horror-action piece.

As Ana, Polley convincingly plays a waif turned survivor with just the right amount of emoting. She is strong and vulnerable at the same moment, trying to remain reasonable in unreasonable times. Weber also fits this bill as Michael, a man with a shady past full of regret who tries to fill others with hope while remaining a stark realistic.

Rhames' performance clearly commands the most attention. As Kenneth, he becomes the group's de facto leader and top man of action. He keeps the clearest head when trouble is afoot and leads the group out of one scrape after another. Rhames gives the character a silent strength that provides the film with a much needed human edge.

First time director Zack Snyder moves the film along briskly and effectively, keeping the action scenes tight and the dramatic scenes quiet. There is no heavy-handed sermonizing here that tends to infiltrate most big-budget horror movies -- Snyder wisely lets the images speak for themselves.

The horror itself is shocking and grabs your attention, which is a plus considering most of the recent crop of thrillers. The fact that it is happening to sympathetic characters that we care about is another feather in the movie's cap.

All to often most horror movies are just excuses for numerous poorly developed characters to be killed in awful ways for the enjoyment of the audience. As far as recent zombie movies go, `Dawn of the Dead' thankfully remains closer to `28 Days Later' than `House of the Dead.'

However, despite all the movie's strengths, it still pales in comparison to the original. Romero's `Dawn of the Dead' took the premise of people trapped in mall and used it to make some pointed social commentary about consumerism. The first '`Dawn' had human characters selfishly hoarding material goods for themselves, using the mall not only as a refuge from zombies but also as their own personal palace that provides them with more items than they could ever need.

It's to the detriment of the new film that it never takes the concept to this level. Here, the story seems to take place in a mall because it's a cool place for a horror movie, not because it can draw out anything interesting in the characters themselves. Also, in the original the zombies wanted inside not only to eat the humans but also because they are drawn to the shopping center since is was an important place to them when they were alive.

It's a shame that this time around viewers won't get the chance to see zombies wandering around JC Penney or stumbling up and down escalators, the joke being humans amble about aimlessly themselves like the undead at the mall.

`Dawn of the Dead' is a very bloody and terrifying film but it lacks the superior gory effects from the 1978 movie. That should not stop the squeamish from twitching in their seats due to the horrific content onscreen.

Good acting and smart thinking elevates the proceedings among most other horror offerings, but compared to Romero's original it lacks the observations necessary to make it a classic. The first film remains an intelligent critique on human actions during the apocalypse, while this is just a suspense drama that is dressed to kill.

8 out of 10 stars.
